original_text: Then some wise men went to the king. They told him bad things against the Jews.
korean_text: 그 때에 어떤 갈대아 사람들이 나아와 유다 사람들을 참소하니라

sentences.original_text: Then some wise men went to the king.
They told him bad things against the Jews.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 유대인들을 해치는 나쁜 일들을 그에게 말했습니다.
